1.title: Blind Auditions 1
1.plot: It was the first blind audition of the third season. The coaches this year are: Johannes Strate, Lena Meyer-Landrut and Mark Forster. These coaches will turn around in their chair when they hear a performer (between the age of 8 and 14) they want in their team. If there are more coaches who want a performer, he or she gets to choose who they want as their coach.

These coaches will turn around in their chair when they hear a performer (between the age of 8 and 14) they want in their team. If there are more coaches who want a performer, he or she gets to choose who they want as their coach.

imdb.plot outline: There are three coaches, who are all famous in the music industry. During the blind auditions these coaches will turn around in their chair when they hear a performer (between the age of 8 and 14) they want in their team. If there are more coaches who want a performer, he or she gets to choose who they want as their coach. During the battles there will be two or three contestants from the same team up against eachother. The coach then has to choose one of them to get through to the live finale.
imdb.title: The Voice Kids
plot: There are three coaches, who are all famous in the music industry. During the blind auditions these coaches will turn around in their chair when they hear a performer (between the age of 8 and 14) they want in their team. If there are more coaches who want a performer, he or she gets to choose who they want as their coach. During the battles there will be two or three contestants from the same team up against eachother. The coach then has to choose one of them to get through to the live finale.::ImmeVanGorp
